posts.title: Node is awesome
posts.body: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

posts.title: Spring Boot is cooler
posts.body: Spring Boot makes it easy to create stand-alone, production-grade Spring based Applications that you can 'just run'.

posts.title: Go is faster
posts.body: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.

posts.title: 'What about me?' -Rails
posts.body: Ruby on Rails makes it much easier and more fun. It includes everything you need to build fantastic applications, and you can learn it with the support of our large, friendly community.
